Configure Project/Temporary Files

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Miscellaneous | Temporary Files) to set the options for temporary files. The options are:

  • The directory where Version Manager creates temporary files that are generated during delta processing.
  • The directory where Version Manager stores the temporary copies of archives before updating them.

NOTE If you are using a Version Manager File Server, do not set WorkDir or ArchiveWork to a directory that is mapped to the file server.

Field Descriptions

Miscellaneous | Temporary Files
Temporary Archive Copies Directory Enter the directory in which Version Manager will store the temporary archive copies or click the Browse button and select it.
Temporary Internal Files Directory Enter the directory in which Version Manager will create the temporary internal files or click the Browse button to select it.

See Also

Setting Temporary File Options Temporary File Options
